category.quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
category.author: Dr. Suess

category.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
category.author: Stephen King

category.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
category.author: Mark Twain

category.quote: When I dare to be powerful
category.author: to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.– Audre Lorde

category.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
category.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

category.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
category.author: David Brinkley

category.quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
category.author: John F. Kennedy

category.quote: I can’t give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.- Herbert Bayard Swope
It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
category.author: Theodore Roosevelt

category.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
category.author: Lucille Ball

category.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
category.author: Mother Teresa

category.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
category.author: Joshua J. Marine

category.quote: Love is a serious mental disease.
category.author: Plato

category.quote: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
category.author: Leonardo Da Vinci

category.quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
category.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

category.quote: It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
category.author: J. K Rowling

category.quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
category.author: Pablo Picasso

category.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
category.author: Thomas A. Edison

category.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
category.author: Albert Einstein

category.quote: The opposite of love is not hate; it’s indifference.
category.author: Elie Wiesel

category.quote: I never knew how to worship until I knew how to love.
category.author: Henry Ward Beecher

category.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
category.author: Jim Morrison

category.author: Albert Einstein
